channel.title: Help!
channel.description: Ok, I was hosting a server (Allstar V2) and when I got home from school, it didn't work anymore. I have no-ip, I have Java 6 u11, and I port forwarded. Now, when I go to run it, it says error connecting to server. I have no clue how to get it to run. Please help me!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Johnnyboy93 Johnnyboy93
item.description:
@Johnnyboy93 wrote:

Hell YA! It worked. All because I got utorrent. Thanks Alot! I would rep, but I only have 10. But thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @rune_mate99 rune mate99
item.description:
@rune_mate99 wrote:

[quote=“Johnnyboy93, post:13, topic:260477”]Im sorry also, I am just mad because this happend. I have no clue how or why it doesn’t let me on, but I will give your guys’ answers a shot. I hope it works.

~ John[/quote]

Same thing that happened to me man, use utorrent method AND port forwarding, also go into your modem / router. and enable DMZ for my modem its in the firewall tab, but u need to find it

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Johnnyboy93 Johnnyboy93
item.description:
@Johnnyboy93 wrote:

Im sorry also, I am just mad because this happend. I have no clue how or why it doesn’t let me on, but I will give your guys’ answers a shot. I hope it works.

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:10, topic:260477”][quote author=SandScape link=topic=343909.msg2657212#msg2657212 date=1233954147]
and thats why 10-12 year olds dont need rps they dont listen to anybody
[/quote]You didn’t have to say that at all. Completely unnecessary; the thread was over hours ago.

[quote author=Johnnyboy93 link=topic=343909.msg2657589#msg2657589 date=1233968967]
Dude, im 15 you dumbass. How old are you?? Like 17, 18, or even older? Get a life… I bet you “Sandscape” still live with your mother… Get a job, move out, and get a life.
[/quote]Generally 17-18, you’re a senior in highschool. Assumming this, he probably still lives with his mom, as all students still attending highschool should

The thread is done. Johnny, if your server isn’t working, try re-prefrencing your no-ip duc, or messing with your portforwarding settings. If anything it’s a common mistake.[/quote]his no-ip duc probally expired he should have gotten a email with a reactivation link

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

No-ip host do expire, So if you have been hosting for some time your no-ip host may expire. You can update your host by going to the website and updating it manually, That is just my guess of what’s wrong.

Read full topic

Now, when I go to run it, it says error connecting to server. I have no clue how to get it to run. Please help me![/quote]if your computer turned off you might have to just open that port again
